DescriptionData.Title: Clown Ministry Handbook - Litherland
DescriptionData.Description: A book of clown ministry basics with skits for service and worship. Covers organizing a clown ministry troupe for in churches or an outreach program. There are many skits and sketches for service or worship activities and descriptive information about clown types, makeup, costumes, props and performance techniques.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Covers clown ministry basics with skits for service and worship
Tips for organizing a clown ministry troupe
Skits and sketches for service and worship
Descriptive information about clown types, makeup, costumes, props, and performance techniques
Essential tips for clowns and entertainers of all levels
